「隣町へ荷物届けに行ったは良いものの...」.Translation: 「I went to deliver a package to the neighboring town, but...」

「まさかこんな夜更けになるとはねえ...」.Translation: 「I never thought it would get this late...」

「道具屋のおばちゃん、つかまると話長いの忘れてたよ」.Translation: 「I forgot how much the old lady at the tool shop loves to talk once you catch her.」

「この橋も夜に歩きたくないしなぁ」.Translation: 「I really don't want to walk this bridge at night...」

「仕方ない、渡るしかないか」.Translation: 「I guess I have no choice but to cross.」

「今日も随分と話し込んじゃったなぁ」.Translation: 「I really got caught up in conversation today.」

「さっさと渡って早く村へ帰ろう」.Translation: 「Let's hurry across and get back to the village.」

「何かに見られているような気がする...」.Translation: 「I feel like I'm being watched by something...」

「そんな妖精を見れるなんてこの橋も捨てたもんじゃないな」.translation: To see such a fairy makes this bridge not so bad after all.

「一人一人の技術が試されるだろう」.translation: Each person's skill will be put to the test.

「今回の相手はいままでと比べ物にならないぞ」.translation: This opponent is nothing like the ones before.

「常に戦況を見据えなければ勝利を掴めない」.translation: You must always keep an eye on the battle situation to grasp victory.

「次に来た時には何か良い事がおこりそうかもな...」.translation: Maybe something good will happen next time I come...

「水辺に現れると言われる幸運の妖精だったかな」.translation: Isn't there a lucky fairy said to appear by the water?

! Until the start of the secret Boss 10.translation: ! 10 sec until the secret Boss battle starts !

! Until the start of the secret Boss 30.translation: ! 30 sec until the secret Boss battle starts !

! 次ラウンドがシークレットになる！ !.translation: ! The next round will be a secret! !
